projects: [{"title":"Ontology for safety analytics","start_date":"Apr 2018","end_date":"Jul 2018","description":"Worked under Prof. Jhareshwar Maiti (Head of Industrial and Systems Engineering Department).•Prepared an ontology on how to minimise accidents/injuries happening to workers/employees at TATA STEEL, Jamshedpur.•Used basics of Text Mining to develop ontology and provide number of preventive and mitigative risk control systems.• Worked for 15 days at TATA STEEL, Jamshedpur to collect data and make it appropriate for text mining."}]

honors_and_awards.title: Inter hall data analytics 2019 | Telecommunication industry data
honors_and_awards.description: 1. Beginning with a comprehensive analysis of the given data which involved calculation of basic descriptive statistics for each feature. 2. Used various models such as Logistic regression, Random forest, and XGBoost backed by feature engineering and fine-tuning of the model parameter to further improve the models.

honors_and_awards.title: product design
honors_and_awards.description: Member of Bronze winning team in Open IIT Product Design 2017. Designed a product named 'ELMOS' to eradicate Japanese encephalitis in the paddy fields of rural areas
